import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} back() { this.router.navigateByUrl('farmer/process/list'); } }
